lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 31 -- Field Marshal Jan Christiaan Smuts, Premier of South Africa, in a "man-to-man" broadcast in Dutch to the Netherlands and Belgium tonight, bade the people of those countries be courageous and have hope, for "humanity will yet gather the fruit of the sacrifices borne by our sorely stricken generation."

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
